title: No free RP ?
body: So i just reached lvl 5 on my account and i didnt get my 400 free RP.. Is this a bug or the free 400 RP have been removed ?{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Rito Gums,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=f990Rb2k,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-06-14T00:33:27.219+0000)
>
> It gives chests instead now

Remember to NOT perm Ashe and Garen through the shards, that gives terrible value for your essence and shards. Instead you can buy Ashe with 450 IP which is incredibly cheap, get Garen for free from following riot on twitter (or also for 450 IP), save the essence to perm a more expensive shard (ideally a 6300 tier champ) and use the shards with a third shard to get a random champion permanent through a reroll.
This is correct!  Instead of getting 400 RP, we've replaced that with the Purple Hextech Chest as well as a free key.

hey dArt i know i saw the purple hextechs on the pbe awhile back  and i just wanted to know if that was only a pbe thing and also if u guys had ever planned on giving out purple hextechs for idk like special rewards for events n stuff  idk what the term im looking for
They gave 1 for free when they started hextech crafting.

I remember on the PBE at one point there was a Purple Legendary chest and i think a green chest. Whatever happened to those? I know as of now you are given one for free but im confused as to why they are unavailable after that.

To be perfectly honest, I have no idea about these other types of chests.  It is entirely possible that they were just exploratory tests on the PBE.  Remember, not everything we do on the PBE will necessarily make it onto Live.  It is a good place to test ideas as well!
